# Black Luminary (WondArch)
## Overview
**Black Luminary:** This large (3-foot-wide) steel half-orb sheds *[[Darkness (Spell)|darkness]]* in a 20-foot radius around itself. The creator of the orb can choose to include a shutter that will block the darkness when closed.

*Caster Level:* 3rd; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Darkness (Spell)|darkness]]**; Market Price:* 6,000 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 71
